thread.section_title: The Iroquois New York - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Stay!
thread.title_full: Great Stay! - Review of The Iroquois New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Pete S
title: Great Stay!
text: Highly recommend the Iroquois! It's a beautiful historic hotel, with a midtown location that makes it convenient to the theatre district. We received great service from a very professional staff, and really enjoyed our stylish room and extremely comfy bed. I would also like to mention their Library just off the lobby--a coffee and tea room with books and newspapers of their guests. Loved our stay!
